analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#363-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#377)

ZitKOINCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#518-525) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(TEAM_ADDRESS,TEAM_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#518-519)
	-token.mint(FUTURE_ME_ADDRESS,FUTURE_ME_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#519-522)
	-token.mint(ADVISORS_ADDRESS,ADVISORS_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#522-523)
	-token.mint(AIRDROP_ADDRESS,AIRDROP_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol#523-525)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol)

ZitKOINCrowdsale.recoverERC20Tokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(_erc20).transfer(msg.sender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xff4b417892f3ca1678a288cc6296a7094bf98f0b.sol)
